text: Adolfo Alperi (born 12 September 1970) is a Spanish cyclist. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Spain Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Oviedo
title: Adolfo Alperi
